Basically this. The key to effective dogfighting is to get yourself into a position where you need as little deflection as possible.
I always hold my fire until about 400m, and only fire short bursts

I always hold my fire until about 400m, and only fire short bursts

I set mine up the other way.

Convergence on my planes is set to 2500 feet, and I lay down short streaks of bullets when I see that I am close to the target. Lotta times I'll take out an AA position while still more than 1000 feet away. Yes you can make the game use Imperial units. My altimeter properly displays 40,000 feet when I feel like flying that high.

Also what factor is used for your mission difficulty? I just noticed I got moved up to the level 2-3 bracket, even though I've been overall level 3 for a while now.

...that bug that makes it lock my computer up is really becoming a problem though. Like to a point where if they don't fix it in the next update I probably won't continue to play this. More often than not the game crashes trying to launch anything other than the Stalingrad field.
